testcase.classname: Registration | User could signup with a new account
testcase.name: sc_01 | User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user click on register link...........................................passed When user fills personal details with valid data............................passed And user fills pass with valid data.........................................passed And user click on register button...........................................passed Then success message displayed..............................................passed

testcase.classname: Login | users could login to open their accounts
testcase.name: sc_02 | user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user should go to login page..........................................passed When user login with valid "email@gmail.com" and "asdf@1234"................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.name: sc_03 | User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged in with email and password.............................passed When user should click on my account link then click on change password.....passed And user fills old pass "asdf@1234" and new pass............................passed And user click on Change password button....................................passed Then user has changed his-her password successfully.........................passed

testcase.classname: Search | Logged User could search for any product
testcase.name: sc_04 | user could search for product using fullname

testcase.classname: Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.name: sc_05 | user could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: When user select Euro currency..............................................passed Then user could see product with Euro currency..............................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.name: sc_06 | user could select from different Categories
testcase.system-out: When user could select a category...........................................passed And user can select sub category if found...................................passed Then user could see results.................................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could filter with color
testcase.name: sc_07| user could filter with color
testcase.system-out: When user could select Apparel..............................................passed And user could select color gray............................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could select different tags
testcase.name: sc_08 | user could select different tags
testcase.system-out: When user search using the name of the product..............................passed And user could select "awesome" tag.........................................passed And user could select "book" tag............................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.name: sc_09 | user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.system-out: When user could select a category...........................................passed And user can select sub category if found...................................passed And user click add item to cart.............................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could add different products to Wishlist
testcase.name: sc_10 | user could add different products to Wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given user could select a category..........................................passed And user can select sub category if found...................................passed And user click add to Wishlist..............................................passed Then added successfully to Wishlist.........................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could add different products to compare list
testcase.name: sc_11 | user could add different products to compare list
testcase.system-out: Given user could select a category..........................................passed And user can select sub category if found...................................passed And user click add to compare list..........................................passed And user click add to compare list..........................................passed Then added successfully to compare list.....................................passed

testcase.name: sc_12 | user could create a successful Order
